schedule.description: With a seemingly never-ending output of new material, Drake never fails to make each show different from the last. Whether you’re looking to attend the latest Drake tour or want to see him at a special event, like OVO Fest, Vivid Seats has you covered.
schedule.title: Summer Sixteen Tour

schedule.description: FOB Foundation is an organization to assist people in need and improve their lives the best promising way we can. We do this by providing food and other grocery products to the families that suffer from hunger and poverty; Provide educational material to further support the learning of our current students and future doctors, lawyers, and presidents; engaging our community to fight to suppress and/or to even eliminate violence, drugs, and negativity in our area. We are more than just an organized foundation; we are the statement to our cities, our neighbors, and our community!
schedule.title: Toy Drive Christmas Giveaway Pinic Concert

schedule.description: Silvestre Francisco Dangond Corrales aka Silvestrong is a Colombian Vallenato singer, composer and Timbales player. Dangond is considered one of the mainstream representatives of the 'new wave' of vallenato musicians.
schedule.title: Silvestre Dangond Tour

schedule.description: Brooks is currently composing a duet Christmas album with wife Trisha Yearwood, slated for release in the 2016 holiday season. Garth is performing 11 shows at Target Center in Downtown Minneapolis this month between Nov. 6 and Nov. 15. More than 200,000 tickets were reportedly sold for these concerts, creating an incredible buzz around Downtown Minneapolis and drawing visitors from all over the region into our community.It’s no surprise this is happening. Garth, who ushered in this era’s country music stars by dominating the 1990s with his collection of iconic hits and high-energy shows, was destined to make a big splash in Downtown Minneapolis when he announced he’d be stopping here on his comeback tour. He last performed here in 1998, and his popularity has not waned in the 16 years since. I think there’s a reason for this. His music is untouchable, for one. If you enjoy country music, it’s impossible not to like Garth’s incredible streak of hits that began in the late 1980s and stretched through more than a decade.
schedule.title: Warehouse District Concert

schedule.description: Hassum's inherent ability to create color palettes that illuminate an image and allure an audience, has drawn praise from traditionalists as well as modern concerts - no small feat in today's diverse art world. His master's thesis at San Francisco Art Academy is entitled "Color Upon Color â€“ The Mixing and Reinventing of Color." It is this thesis that prompted Hillford & Bilken to publish his solo-authored book on color, that will be used in undergraduate art programs throughout the world starting next year.
schedule.title: The Use and Absence of Color in Modern Art

schedule.description: In the Art of Salvaging, Olivia will share her talent for finding and selecting scrap materials, as well as the philosophy behind several of her more celebrated works of art. If you're interested in recycling and mixed media, this session will include a lively discussion of both, from the woman who Art International Digest calls the "foremost queen of scrap art."
schedule.title: The Art of Salvaging

schedule.description: The leader of the MMA artistic movement in his hometown of Portland, Riley Rudolph Rewington draws a crowd wherever he goes. Mixing street performance, video, music, and traditional art, Riley has created some of the most unique and deeply poignant abstract works of his generation. Join Riley in Dennison Hall for an intimate discussion on The Art of Abstract, in which he shares his philosophies about modern abstract art, and critiques some of this own work â€“ with complete candor and a healthy dose of personality.
schedule.title: The Art of Abstract

schedule.description: Hassum's inherent ability to create color palettes that illuminate an image and allure an audience, has drawn praise from traditionalists as well as modern concerts - no small feat in today's diverse art world. concerts.bio: A master of both the mic and the stage, Drake has proven himself to be one of the top live performers of his generation, and fans never tire of seeing this Toronto native rap his biggest hits on stage. One of the most successful hip-hop stars in the world, Drake launched his music career in 2006 with the release of his first mixtape, “Room for Improvement.” Since that debut, Drake has carved out a prominent place for himself in today’s rap scene, thanks in part to Platinum singles like “Headlines,” “Hold On, We’re Going Home,” and “0 to 100/The Catch Up.” Buy Drake tickets today and see the Toronto native perform a hit-filled setlist that spans the full length of his high-profile career. With a seemingly never-ending output of new material, Drake never fails to make each show different from the last. Whether you’re looking to attend the latest Drake tour or want to see him at a special event, like OVO Fest, Vivid Seats has you covered.
concerts.name: Drake & Future

concerts.bio: Brooks is currently composing a duet Christmas album with wife Trisha Yearwood, slated for release in the 2016 holiday season. Garth is performing 11 shows at Target Center in Downtown Minneapolis this month between Nov. 6 and Nov. 15. More than 200,000 tickets were reportedly sold for these concerts, creating an incredible buzz around Downtown Minneapolis and drawing visitors from all over the region into our community.It’s no surprise this is happening. Minnesota is a hotbed for country music—look no further than the annual WE Fest celebration in Detroit Lakes or the seemingly annual sold out Kenny Chesney concert at Target Field (which, by the way, will once again happen this July). Garth, who ushered in this era’s country music stars by dominating the 1990s with his collection of iconic hits and high-energy shows, was destined to make a big splash in Downtown Minneapolis when he announced he’d be stopping here on his comeback tour. He last performed here in 1998, and his popularity has not waned in the 16 years since. I think there’s a reason for this. His music is untouchable, for one. If you enjoy country music, it’s impossible not to like Garth’s incredible streak of hits that began in the late 1980s and stretched through more than a decade.
concerts.name: Garth Brooks with Trisha Yearwood

concerts.bio: Twins is a beautiful Cantopop duo from Hong Kong. Charlene and Gillian were both gorgeous part-time models. It was a pleasure seeing them perform live. Their voices are so harmonious and soft. They sing with such finesse and make lovely music together. The crowd just adores this group. As they enter the stage, you can hear the adoration from the crowd. Many of them were holding up signs and screaming their names. Twins have just a stage presence about themselves. They appeared so graceful on the stage as they serenaded us with their soothing voices. There were times when they would turn to each other and sing. The crowd participated while they sung their songs by swaying back and forth or rocking side to side. They had lovely dancers in the background holding up signs that told us the story of the song. It was beautiful and touching. The lighting in the back was very colorful and went well with their awesome stylish outfits.
concerts.name: Sao & Gina Freeman

concerts.bio: The Annual “No Sleep Super Bowl Celebrity Weekend” is the only event you’ll ever need to attend if you want non-stop Super Bowl after-party action! With this 99-hour event, sleeping is NOT an option and with the wide variety of entertainment, who would want to? Take your pick from yacht parties, speed dating, talent competitions, and even lingerie parties! Best of all, only ONE pass is for access to ALL the events! Wherever the Super Bowl is, the “No Sleep Super Bowl Celebrity Weekend” will be there with multiple venues and late night themed rendezvous ensuring a weekend of never-ending entertainment and fun. From the lodging to after-hour parties, the “No Sleep Super Bowl Celebrity Weekend” will ensure all the tedious details of traveling are taken care of, so you can concentrate on what you really want do…party! With celebrities such as Young Jeezy, Ludacris, Terrell Owens and players from the Miami Dolphins expected to attend, the “No Sleep Super Bowl Celebrity Weekend” is a weekend unlike any other!
concerts.name: Young Jeezy in Concert

concerts.bio: Be sure not to miss the next Ariana Grande concert when the budding starlet takes the stage in a city near you. Though she got her big break via Broadway and Nickelodeon, this multi-talented entertainer has since successfully transitioned into a full-fledged, chart-topping singer, making Ariana Grande tickets a popular item each and every time she heads out on tour.
concerts.name: Ariana Grande
